programme.title: Luck-Key
programme.desc: A case of stolen identity leads to hilarious events when a struggling actor and a hit man for hire swaps lives.

programme.title: The Merciless
programme.desc: A notorious gangster teams up with a prison newbie to take over the crime ring, yet the trust between shaken when their ulterior motives come to light.

programme.title: Meet The In-Laws
programme.desc: Hyun Joon and his girlfriend Da Hong are ready to tie the knot, but there's one big problem: Da Hong's father is strongly against him because of his hometown. Will they ever make it to the altar?

programme.title: The Divine Fury
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: Gonjiam: Haunted Asylum
programme.desc: A handful of people are recruited to live stream a horror show at Gonjiam, Korea's most haunted hospital. To attract more viewers, scares are set up along the way, but soon things take a darker turn.

programme.title: Metamorphosis
programme.desc: An evil spirit that changes faces infiltrates a family, placing one brother in danger while the other tries to save him.

programme.title: 0.0Mhz
programme.desc: A group of thrill seekers try to prove the existence of ghost by using radio frequency technology inside the notorious haunted asylum.

programme.title: Diva
programme.desc: A diving diva submerges into an unknown depth of fear after getting into a terrible car accident with her best friend.

programme.title: Mourning Grave
programme.desc: In-su, with the ability to see ghosts, built a special friendship with a girl ghosts. Meanwhile, his classmates disappeared one by one and rumour says a masked ghost is the culprit.

programme.title: South Bound
programme.desc: Choi Hae-gap has a family who will stand by his decisions given any scenario. As a team, they fight the government's plans to build a resort on the island of their ancestors.

programme.title: My Little Bride
programme.desc: A high school girl was forced to marry a college student by her grandfather. The effort to keep the marriage secret was soon challenged as her husband will be teaching in her school as an intern…

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: Rampant
programme.desc: Returning from imprisonment abroad, a prince and his fellow countrymen band together to battle bloodthirsty demons in ancient Korea.

programme.title: The House
programme.desc: A young couple moves back to their hometown in hopes of starting a family. But when dark memories from their past begin to surface, strange things begin to happen in their house.

programme.title: Making Family
programme.desc: Raised by a single mom in Korea, Tae Bong has always wanted to know who his dad was. He discovers that his dad is a young Chinese man who had donated sperm years ago and sets out to meet him.

programme.title: Iris: The Movie
programme.desc: Two rival special agents, both in love with a beautiful but lethal profiling specialist, are faced to confront each other in a nuclear terrorist attack.

programme.title: More Than Family
programme.desc: College student To-il was pregnant for 5 months and decided to marry her younger boyfriend. Her mother and stepfather opposed the decision, she hence set off to find her biological father.

programme.title: The Scam
programme.desc: Hyeon-Soo joins an elite team formed by a gangster-turned-investor who attempt their biggest scam to swindle $60,000,000 from the stock market.

programme.title: A Violent Prosecutor
programme.desc: After a prosecution lawyer is framed and convicted for murder, he tries to catch the real murderer from jail with the help of a con artist.

programme.title: The Berlin File
programme.desc: A North Korean agent in Berlin is betrayed and cut loose when a weapons deal is exposed. He tries to escape being purged, while being pursued by a North and South Korean operative.

programme.title: The Divine Fury
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: Sori: Voice From The Heart
programme.desc: A father searching for his missing daughter finds a satellite that remembers sounds from across the world. Using his daughter's voice as a beacon, the satellite helps him track her down.

programme.title: 0.0Mhz
programme.desc: A group of thrill seekers try to prove the existence of ghost by using radio frequency technology inside the notorious haunted asylum.

programme.title: The Neighbors
programme.desc: A young girl was murdered and resident of the building suspects the killer lives among them. The battle against this murderous neighbor begins.

programme.title: Secret Zoo
programme.desc: Dreams of landing a permanent position at a top law firm, a lawyer takes on an unusual assignment of keeping an ownerless zoo running by convincing its employees to dress up as animals.

programme.title: A Tiger In Winter
programme.desc: On a winter day, a man is kicked out of his girlfriend's apartment. He then begins a job as a substitute driver at night. One night, he meets his ex-girlfriend who now works as a novelist.

programme.title: The Merciless
programme.desc: A notorious gangster teams up with a prison newbie to take over the crime ring, yet the trust between shaken when their ulterior motives come to light.

programme.title: Unforgettable

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep44884489

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep793794
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1756
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1951
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3495
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: New Taiwan Go (M) Ep2494
programme.desc: Depth analysis of the day breaking news headlines to restore the truth inside

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3495
programme.desc: <Stylish Man – The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng, Bernice Tsai and Genie Chuo, together with two professional chefs, A-Chi and James. There are two main themes for the program, which are “Big Stars Come to Cook” and “Five-Star Cooking Show”. <Stylish Man – The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep44904491
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep797798
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai,Chao and his wife Chin-hsiu,Li have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father’s invention dream, the Chao brothers’ lives are about to change… Chin-Pang,Chou used to be Chin-Hsiu’s lover, and has been Chu-Tsai’s long-time business rival. Seeing Chu-Tsai not only successfully keep the patents of soy sauce products, but also has all the support and assistance from his children, Chin-Pang, filled with bitterness, has been crushing and attacking Chu-Tsai in every way. Hsin-Ta, Chu-Tsai’s eldest son, couldn’t bear to see his father suffer, so he quit his job to take over the family business. To everyone’s surprise, Chu-Tsai discovers that Hsin-Ta is actually Chin-Pang’s son! Finding out that the enemy is actually his biological father devastated Hsin-Ta, and this also drives a wedge between Chin-pang and his son Hsiao-Ming, as he feels threatened. Chu-tsai’s second son Ying-kai has always set his goal to reach the top of his career. Vacillating between Mei-mei and Ying-hui, Ying-kai also finds himself caught in between the feud of two families; however, this opens new business opportunities for him. On the other hand, Hsin-ta fulfills Chu-tsai’s dream; but he is more confused than ever about family love and romance love… All he knows is that with the family’s support, his determination and conviction, he can build a future of his own!

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1952
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker-Wednesday (M) Ep367
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience.

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: Cold War 2
programme.desc: Sean Lau is now the Police Commissioner after the successful rescue operation Cold War. However, the culprits from the past not only dodged justice but even escalated their actions and kidnapped Lau’s wife. He breaks every protocol to get her back, which puts him under investigation.

programme.title: Justice, My Foot!
programme.desc: Chow stars as Sung, a lawyer who uses any means necessary to help his wealthy clients escape the law. Sung retires to the countryside when urged by his wife, but when Mrs Sung encounters a woman whose husband's death has been covered up by corrupted officials, Sung returns to the court for justice to be served.

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Ru’s financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the client’s data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: God of War
programme.desc: During the 16th century, pirates rule the Chinese coastline, pillaging the small villages and terrorizing the citizens. When maverick leader Commander Yu (martial arts legend Sammo Hung) enlists the help of a sharp young general (Vincent Zhao), they devise a plan to defeat the pirates.

programme.title: Kung Fu Yoga
programme.desc: Jack, a renowned archaeology professor, and his team are on a quest to locate a lost ancient Indian treasure. They find a diamond key unlocking the treasure, but it is snatched by a team of mercenaries. Jack leads his team to India and Dubai to beat the mercenaries to the treasure.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: Tiger, Lambert and Skinny Pig are massive fans of the movie, Flirting Scholar. One day, Skinny Pig who is an obscure inventor, puts together a “movie time machine” and accidentally sucks all of them into the movie of Flirting Scholar. The trio head off to Wah mansion to meet the maid Autumn – can they find her and can they return to the present?

programme.title: Men on the Dragon
programme.desc: When massive layoffs are expected, four middle-aged men pledge their loyalty to the company by joining the newly formed dragon boat team. As the four embark on their rigorous training, they are forced to face their respective mid-life issues. The process rekindles their long-lost fighting spirit, and they begin to welcome life’s challenges.

programme.title: Fleet of Time
programme.desc: A coming-of-age tale about a group of close friends from high school, college and eventually reaching adulthood through the 1990s and 2000s. They meet again at a friend's wedding in 2014 and recall their romantic past through memories.

programme.title: Genghis Khan
programme.desc: Before he became the great Khan he was known as Temüjin, and was deeply in love with his childhood sweetheart Börte. News of Temüjin's father's death disrupted their relationship and as Temüjin heads back home, he faces a sudden attack from his father's former comrades, causing his whole tribe to be destroyed.

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three bizarre tales intertwine in this horror satire set against the housing crisis of Hong Kong, where soaring property prices have driven dwellers to take every insane effort necessary to secure a cramped space, even if it means sharing the same roof with the dead!

programme.title: Let's Have a Baby
programme.desc: After several years of marriage, Prof. Wu Te-sheng (Alex Man Chi-leung) and his wife Wan Chun (Patricia Ha Man-jik) decide to have children. Then a medical examination shows Wu is the cause of the couple's infertility, and Wu reluctantly adopts his doctor's advice to have his wife artificially inseminated in Hawaii.

programme.title: Legend of the Demon Cat
programme.desc: Adapted from a Japanese fantasy novel, a demon cat appears and breaks the peace of Chang'an city, causing a series of mysterious events. A poet and a Japanese monk band together to follow the trails left by the cat, leading them to discover a buried secret.

programme.title: Nightfall
programme.desc: Detective George Lam investigates the brutal death of a Sino-British conductor and suspects he is murdered by Wong Yuen Yeung, a dumb killer who has just been released from prison. When out on a manhunt for Wong, Lam finds more revelations to the contrary and has to pursue every possibility, taking him deep into Wong’s past.

programme.title: Shoplifters
programme.desc: A Japanese family with lowly paid part-time jobs turns to shoplifting to make ends meet. After one shoplifting session, the father Osamu and his son come across a little girl in the cold. Osamu’s wife agrees to take her in after learning her hardships, and they seem to live happily together until an unforeseen incident reveals hidden secrets..

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Executive produced by Wong Kar Wai, “The Eagle Shooting Heroes” is loosely based on Louis Cha’s classics. Whilst mistaken identity and rampant gender confusion are on the menu, Sammo Hung’s action direction and the incredible all-star casts also keep the laughs and thrills coming in this Hong Kong-style crazy comedy.

programme.title: Schemes in Antiques
programme.desc: Despite his family’s expertise in ancient Chinese relics, Xu Yuan becomes an electronics shop owner to distance himself from his disgraced family. However, when an antique is to be returned to China, Xu Yuan uncovers an ancient mystery and soon embarks on a journey that can finally restore his family’s reputation but may also cost him his life.

programme.title: A Lifetime Treasure
programme.desc: A peaceful home for the elderly is under attack when a gangster and his cronies attempt to set up traps to take over the home! Little did they know that the five elderlies residing in the home have amazing talents to take them head on.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: A school bus accident kills almost everyone on board. The bus driver got injured and partially lost his memory while rescuing one of the boys. To thank the driver, the boy’s dad, Wang, brings him to live with the family in their basement. However, the driver soon discovers strange behaviours from the Wang’s which seem to be related to the accident.

programme.title: Miao Miao
programme.desc: Miao Miao is an awkward young beauty who nevertheless enchants her outgoing classmate Xiao Ai. As Xiao Ai’s feelings for Miao Miao grows from friendship to something more, Miao Miao discovers her own burgeoning attraction to a sullen CD store owner, and quietly pursues him.

programme.title: Bell Chamber
programme.desc: Based on a Thai ghost story of Kuman Thong, the film revolves around a woman who has caused the death of her young brother a long time ago. When she returns to the old house where they lived before, she finds herself haunted by the spirit of her young brother wanting to take revenge for his death.

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Prince Charming
programme.desc: Chen Li Pin, the nerdy son of a business tycoon, and his friend seek love in Hawaii. Returning home in disappointment, they accidentally find themselves in a messy identity swap. It is at this time that Chen falls for a beautiful girl May, who thinks he is a company chauffeur…

programme.title: Bleeding Steel
programme.desc: A Hong Kong police inspector, Lin Dong, had to protect an important witness in his mission thirteen years ago. This not only forced him to be separated from his daughter, but also got him involved in a conspiracy spanning more than a decade.

programme.title: Murderer
programme.desc: A police officer Tai is found seriously hurt while another officer Ling is found lying in a coma at the crime scene. Ling awakens with a memory loss and cannot explain why he was at the scene. As a result, he is accused of attempted murder. While Ling feels aggrieved, he also finds all evidences pointing to him as the murderer...

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kong’s toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Push and Shove
programme.desc: A puppy gets gravely injured while defending them from the neighbor's large and aggressive Tibetan Mastiff. The arrogant owner of the Tibetan Mastiff, however, refuses to take responsibility, and the police aren't of much help since no people were hurt. When push comes to shove, the puppy’s owner vows to fight for justice for his dog.

programme.title: Invisible Target
programme.desc: Three young police officers driven by different motives decide to join forces to defeat Tien and his lethal, mercenary gang. As they team up to prevent another massive robbery, they discover that it is instigated by another unknown man. With courage, wits and dexterity, the trio are determined to not let Tien and the instigator escape.

programme.title: My Country, My Parents
programme.desc: Set in 4 different eras in China, the 4-part anthology about ‘home and country’ is directed by Wu Jing, Zhang Zi Yi, Xu Zheng and Shen Teng, who also star in their own story. The movie depicts how the ‘fathers’ forge ahead through the struggle of times, defending strong family ties and passing on the ‘fighting’ spirit through generations.

programme.title: Oath Of Death
programme.desc: Three Sung loyalists become blood brothers to fight the tyranny of the Tartar invaders. To oust the oppressors altogether, Ma releases the kidnapped Tartar princess in a strategic effort to gain points with the invaders, but it soon becomes apparent that he desires both a great position and power, and will do anything to get it…

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happily-ever-after?

programme.title: Killer Darts
programme.desc: A group of bandits raided the village where dart master Liu lives and killed his wife. While hunting them down, Liu’s disciple kills a farmer and his wife when she refuses his advances, leading Liu to adopt their orphaned daughter and raises her with his son. Years later, the daughter meets a man with the bandits and is tricked to go against Liu.

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: Twin Blades Of Doom
programme.desc: A retired martial artist is forced to return with a vengeance after his family and friends are murdered by the evil Ghost Gang. He decides to challenge the gang’s leader to a deadly duel so as to take revenge. Can he defeat the ruthless leader in the end?

programme.title: The Emperor And The Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperor’s plot once again.

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fiancé. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xu’s until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: The Fake Ghost Catchers
programme.desc: This delightful action comedy featuring international favourite Alexander Fu Sheng premiered two years before the American hit Ghostbusters was released. Is it a coincidence? You be the judge as you enjoy this amazing showcase of wushu and wizardry.

programme.title: River Of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband’s death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Godfather Of Canton
programme.desc: Commissioner Liu Ta-hua (Tsao Ta-hua) is arrested by special envoy Cheng Chih-cheng (Wang Jung) for corruption. Coolie Lin Szu-hai (Gordon Liu Chia-hui), who has unintentionally helped Cheng, is given a small post under Lo. Lin is smart and soon learns how to get dockside bribes. Later, he gets a regular spin-off from Adjutant Chang…

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu-lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun-yang.

programme.title: Love without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: Return of Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A band of ninjas slaughters the entire Wu Dang Clan and frames Du Gu Wu Di, chief of the Invincible Clan, for the deed. Yun masters the silkworm martial arts style and decides to take revenge for the Clan by challenging Wu Di, but is defeated and seriously hurt. Luckily, Master Li saves and treats him, allowing Yun to avoid the ninjas’ pursuit.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: Heaven and Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: All Men are Brothers
programme.desc: This is a sequel to Chang Cheh’s epic “The Water Margin”, and follows the patriotic story of seven warriors in the band of 108 outlaws at Mount Liang. The magnificent seven battle against the despotic government officials to save their country.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers’ claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Descendant of the Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: The Shadow Boxing
programme.desc: Chan and his apprentice Fan transport vampires for a living. In their most recent job, they are hired to transport nine zombies at one go. When two of them hopped away, it is revealed that one of them is actually a man in disguise trying to escape from his enemies. It turns out that the fake zombie and Chan are both martial arts experts!

programme.title: 7-Man Army
programme.desc: This iconoclastic film retells the legend of seven Chinese patriots, who sacrificed their lives to defend against 20,000 Japanese soldiers and 50 tanks for 5 days, at a strategic key point of the Great Wall known as Pa Tou Lou Tzu.

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Hun’s warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: The Twelve Gold Medallions
programme.desc: This was one of top three films of 1970 and winner of "Outstanding Drama" at the 9th Golden Horse Awards. The evil minister uses twelve golden medallions to summon war hero Yueh Fei back from the frontline and execute him. A group of wandering warriors, led by Yueh Hua and Chin Ping, try to stop the medallion couriers.

programme.title: Call to Arms
programme.desc: The aggressive and dangerous Chin Empire conquers the hard-put Chao kingdom while the Wei empire is drained of its heroes and paralyzed by an indecisive ruler. Adventure, intrigue, death and tragedy reigns before the triumphant clash of the armies.

programme.title: Human Lanterns
programme.desc: Zhao was once defeated by Long in a duel. 7 years later, however, Long asks Zhao to make a unique lantern on his behalf for winning the lantern contest. At the same time, Zhao plans for revenge. One day, after Long’s wife suddenly disappeared, Long hears about the story of human lantern, leading him to suspect Zhao may involve in the incident…

programme.title: Duel Of Fist
programme.desc: Fan Ke discovers at his father’s deathbed that he has a half-brother, Wenlie, in Thailand. He goes to find Wenlie, who became a boxer to support his sick mother. When the two meet, they are entangled in the underworld of boxing gambling.

programme.title: The Enchanting Ghost
programme.desc: It is love beyond the grave, as a young scholar and his beautiful lover are torn apart forever by his dastardly uncle and his friend, who drive the girl to commit suicide... but with death comes revenge for the enchanting ghost. A spooky yet heart-wrenching tale...

programme.title: The Black Enforcer
programme.desc: Lung the Black Enforcer is ordered to escort a murderer Fei to prison. While taking shelter in Lung’s house from the snowstorm, Fei is rescued by his gang and Fei kills Lung’s mother and sister before escaping. Lung is imprisoned for the failed task and after being released, he vows to avenge his family by killing Fei.

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: Reincarnated Swordsman
programme.desc: A Wu Dang disciple Fu, kills the chief of Wu Dang Clan and frames it on the chief’s illegitimate child, Yun. Fu then proclaims himself the new chief and orders the killing of Yun, who vows to avenge his father’s death and learns the invincible silkworm martial arts style in order to defeat Fu.

programme.title: Double Bliss
programme.desc: Double Bliss tells the story of two students who fall in love and want to wed, but there is one small snag: their parents don't agree! The two ingenious lovebirds come up with what they think is a foolproof plan...They play dead!

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After being separated for many years, two childhood lovers meet in a possibly mythical "Lucky Casino" and vow to rid the establishment of the corrupt military generals, criminals and extortionists!

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The General’s henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Anonymous Heroes
programme.desc: Two young men join a rebel group after the Chinese Revolution of 1911 and become patriotic heroes accidentally. Assisted by a warlord’s daughter, they successfully help the rebels steal weapons from the warlord in this action comedy.

programme.title: Market Raja Mbbs
programme.desc: While in the pursuit of Raja, a ruthless don, the police accidentally kill Chandrababu, a medical student. Things take a turn when Chandrababu's spirit possesses Raja and turns him into a gentle soul.

programme.title: Taana
programme.desc: A life struggle of a man who's trying to become a policeman as his family members wish and forced him to become police and save their village.

programme.title: Sivalinga
programme.desc: Raheem gets killed when he tries to save a blind man in a train. When the police close the case stating suicide, Raheem's girlfriend asks Shivalingeshwaran, a CID officer, to investigate the death.

programme.title: Sridar (Oh My Friend)
programme.desc: Childhood friends Sridhar and Shri have little time to see each other after they fall in love with Ritu and Udhay respectively. Things change when their partners do not approve of their friendship.

programme.title: Samar
programme.desc: Shankar and Roopa fall in love with each other but she suddenly ends their relationship and moves out of the country. Shankar receives a mysterious invitation from Roopa to come to Bangkok.

programme.title: Yaamirukka Bayamey
programme.desc: Is a ghost haunting Kiran's ancestral property? Or is it a conman's master moves?

programme.title: Vanamagan
programme.desc: Kavya, a rich girl, goes to a restricted area in Andaman to celebrate the New Year with her friends. While evading the forest officers in the jungle, she knocks Jara, a tribal man, with her car.

programme.title: Thondan
programme.desc: Narayanan, a politician's son, assaults Vishnu when his brother dies in his ambulance. Later, he makes Vishnu's life miserable by bribing the local police officers and government officials.

programme.title: Thalaivi
programme.desc: A biopic on the late Tamil Nadu Chief Minister J Jayalalithaa.

programme.title: Uppu Karuvadu
programme.desc: Chandran, a filmmaker, is forced to cast the producer's daughter, Mahalakshmi, as the heroine in his movie. But Mahalakshmi cannot act and Chandran struggles to teach her how to act.

programme.title: India Pakistan
programme.desc: Two aspiring lawyers, Karthick and Mellina, not knowing that both are of the same profession, share an office due to financial problems. Things take a turn when they work on the same case.

programme.title: Sreekaram
programme.desc: Karthik, a young IT professional, works in a reputed firm and earns a hefty salary. However, he soon quits his job in order to pursue farming and promote agriculture among the youth.

programme.title: Raja Manthiri
programme.desc: Brothers Surya and Karthi always bicker over small issues from childhood. Things take an interesting turn when Surya's marriage is fixed with Subha, who is actually in love with Karthi.

programme.title: Kedi Billa Killadi Ranga
programme.desc: The story of two loafing friends, who want to enter politics.

programme.title: Ezra
programme.desc: Priya and Ranjan have paranormal experiences after she buys an antique box from a dealer. They learn that the box is a dybbuk and take the help of a rabbi to learn its history.

programme.title: Kappal
programme.desc: Vasu and his friends take a vow to never marry to keep their friendship intact. However, when Vasu falls in love with Deepika, his friends decide to ruin his affair.

programme.title: Freeticket
programme.desc: The host presents a comprehensive compilation of songs and snippets from some of the most popular and trending Tamil movies.

programme.title: Krack (Ravi Teja)
programme.desc: When three notorious criminals lock horns with a hot-tempered police officer, Potharaju Shankar, little do they know that they will end up behind bars.

programme.title: Yaan
programme.desc: Chandru, a jobless man, vows to get a job after the father of his girlfriend opposes their relationship. His joy on getting a job in an Islamic nation ends when he is nabbed there for carrying drugs.

programme.title: Vikram Vedha
programme.desc: A tough police officer sets out to track down and kill an equally tough gangster.

programme.title: Kodiveeran
programme.desc: Kodiveeran, who enjoys a god-like stature in his village, sets out to protect his family as he battles Villangam and Adhigaaram, who pose a threat to his brother-in-law's life.

programme.title: Thumbaa
programme.desc: Hari and Umapathy, two painters, meet Varsha, a wildlife photographer, while working in a forest. Soon, they team up to stop a corrupt officer from capturing a tiger, Thumbaa.

programme.title: Enna Solla Pogirai
programme.desc: Vikram, a young man, plans to make his fiancee fall in love with him. However, when his plan backfires, he finds himself embroiled in a love triangle.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep42

programme.title: Meri Taqat Mera Faisla 2
programme.desc: Veera Pandi is a respectable landlord in Pandiapuram, who is feared by his enemies. Selvam, his obedient son, tries to emulate him and supports him in opposing an irksome MLA.

programme.title: Boss
programme.desc: After his father disowns him, a businessman raises Surya like his own son. Years later, Surya transforms himself into Boss and fights for the rights of the deprived sections of society.

programme.title: Prince
programme.desc: A thief plans the robbery of a lifetime. However, he wakes up one morning to realise that he has lost his memory and his life is at stake.

programme.title: Beqabu
programme.desc: Raja helps imprison a terrorist who then murders him. Years later, Raja's girlfriend comes across his lookalike in Nepal and decides to find the truth.

programme.title: Feet Up With The Stars
programme.desc: The host interacts with celebrities about their work and personal life. Meanwhile, the guests also reveal certain secrets about themselves and indulge in gossip.

programme.title: Athiratha
programme.desc: Following the family legacy, an engineering graduate takes up the job of a TV journalist. One day, he is arrested in connection to a banking scandal and must prove his innocence.

programme.title: Force 2
programme.desc: ACP Yashwardhan, a dutiful and honest police officer, teams up with RAW agent Kamaljit Kaur to expose an inside informer who leaks sensitive information to a foreign agency targeting the RAW agents.

programme.title: Drona
programme.desc: Aditya is an orphaned and lonely young man. He soon learns that he belongs to a family of ancestral warriors who guard a mystic source of cosmic energy, and he must now take up his responsibilities.

programme.title: Drona
programme.desc: Aditya is an orphaned and lonely young man. He soon learns that he belongs to a family of ancestral warriors who guard a mystic source of cosmic energy, and he must now take up his responsibilities.

programme.title: Aladin
programme.desc: A young orphan, Aladin, who gets bullied by his peers, finds a magic lamp that changes his life. Thereafter, he sets off on a series of adventures and uses the lamp to defeat the evil Ringmaster.

programme.title: De Dana Dan
programme.desc: Two penniless friends are in desperate need of money in order to marry their respective girlfriends. In their attempts to make quick money, they kidnap a rich woman's pet and demand a hefty ransom.

programme.title: Brothers
programme.desc: David and Monty, estranged half-brothers, train in mixed martial arts to earn a livelihood. However, things change when the two are forced to compete against each other in the final tournament.

programme.title: Dangerous Khiladi 4
programme.desc: Sreenu and Shruthi fall in love after he chases away his rival Bhavani. However, Sreenu falls into trouble when Rajanna kidnaps Shruthi and asks Sreenu to marry his daughter.

programme.title: What The Fish
programme.desc: Sudha hands over the responsibility of her house and pet fish to her niece's fiance before leaving for a holiday. When she returns, all seems fine until she opens the bathroom door.

programme.title: Naqaab - Disguised Intentions
programme.desc: Sophia is engaged to millionaire Karan who is completely in love with her. However, when she meets her true love, Vicky, and starts seeing him secretly, her relationship with Karan suffers.

programme.title: Pyar Ki Ladai
programme.desc: A jobless man spends his time doing unfruitful things, but his life changes when he falls in love with the sister of a sarpanch. However, to marry her, he must win a kabaddi match.

programme.title: Phir Hera Pheri
programme.desc: The lives of Raju, Shyam and Baburao change completely when they get cheated by a fraudster. Now, they must find another way to repay the loan they took from a dreaded gangster.

programme.title: Luv U Soniyo
programme.desc: Mark, a collegian, falls head over heels for Soniyo, who develops feelings for him as well. However, their parents oppose their union as they both hail from different cultural backgrounds.

programme.title: Dhairyam
programme.desc: Ajay is a bright student from a lower middle class family. He falls in love with Parimala but her family's expectations push him into a financial crisis.

programme.title: Dhairyam
programme.desc: Ajay is a bright student from a lower middle class family. He falls in love with Parimala but her family's expectations push him into a financial crisis.

programme.title: Yeh Lamhe Judaai Ke
programme.desc: Dushant, an aspiring singer, is encouraged by Jaya to achieve his dreams. However, after Dushant becomes successful, his other friends try to create misunderstandings between him and Jaya.

programme.title: Singh Saab The Great
programme.desc: Singh Saab is a responsible tax collector who believes in honesty, but Bhoodev, a conniving man, plots against him. Singh adopts a unique way to teach Bhoodev a lesson.

programme.title: Billu
programme.desc: The people in a village discover that Billu, a poor barber, is a childhood friend of the superstar Sahir Khan, who has arrived for a film shoot. They shower him with favours to introduce them to him.

programme.title: The Fighter Mard No. 1
programme.desc: An honest police officer, Prabhakaran, puts a notorious gangster, Easwaramoorthy, behind bars. When Easwaramoorthy learns of his identity, he decides to take revenge by targeting Prabhakaran's sister.

programme.title: Super Star
programme.desc: Kunal belongs to a middle-class family and aspires to become a film star. He gets his dream opportunity when he is asked to stand in for Karan, a producer's son who looks exactly like him, in a film.

programme.title: Khooni Jung
programme.desc: Shiv Kashi's father puts their family name in jeopardy through nasty tactics. When Shiv finds out about his crimes, he struggles to restore his family's honour.

programme.title: Ek Aur Bol Bachchan
programme.desc: Rehman and his sister move to Bheemarajapuram, where a local landlord employs him at his house. He introduces himself as Ram but later has to face severe trouble to keep up this lie.

programme.title: Awara Paagal Deewana
programme.desc: Dr Anmol, a dentist and henpecked husband, lives a miserable existence in New York due to his domineering wife. However, his troubles increase when he unwittingly gets embroiled in a mafia rivalry.

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding
programme.desc: A scheming ex-girlfriend attends a magnificent wedding determined to prevent it and win back the groom.

programme.title: Poltergeist II: The Other Side
programme.desc: They're back! The Freeling family have a new house, but their troubles with supernatural forces don't seem to be over.

programme.title: Blown Away
programme.desc: An Irish bomber escapes from prison and targets a member of the Boston bomb squad.

programme.title: The Godfather Coda: The Death of Michael Corleone
programme.desc: Michael Corleone (Al Pacino), now in his 60s, seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

programme.title: Beetlejuice
programme.desc: When a couple of nice, young homebody ghosts (Baldwin and Davis) try to haunt the pretentious humans who have moved into their house, they ask for help from a demonic wraith (Keaton) they cannot control in this comic fantasy that mixes the quick and the dead with a laugh and a fright.

programme.title: Outbreak
programme.desc: From Africa to America...it's traveling fast...destroying everything in its path. The Motaba virus inflicts a swift, horrible death, and only one man can stop it from spreading into a deadly worldwide outbreak in this riveting scientific thriller.

programme.desc: In this gripping film - the winner of 7 Academy Awards - the saga of the two Corleone generations continues with DeNiro as the ambitious, immoral immigrant and his son Michael, who consolidates the power handed to him by his father.

programme.title: Call Your Mother
programme.desc: A hilarious ode to moms and the way they have shaped the work of some of comedy's biggest stars.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a news reporter find a quad of mutants which makes an alliance to unravel Shredder's plan as the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.

programme.desc: Avocado Crisis - An avocado shortage brings the city of L.A. to its knees. An exhausted Mikaela discovers the only thing that can put her to sleep is one of Arpi's boring presentations.

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
programme.desc: The evil Khan, marooned on a planet, takes over a space ship and pursues his arch enemy, Captain Kirk and the Enterprise.

programme.title: Jo Koy: LIghts Out (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Jo Koy's star continues to rise in his second feature-length, uncensored stand-up special, Lights Out.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle Of Life
programme.desc: Lara Croft faces her most perilous mission: to recover what ancient civilization believed to be the essence of all evil, Pandora's Box.

programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
programme.desc: Admiral Kirk's defeat of Khan and the creation of the Genesis planet are empty victories. Spock is dead and McCoy is inexplicably being driven insane.

programme.title: The Daily Show (S28) Ep12
programme.desc: Trevor Noah and The Daily Show correspondents tackle the biggest stories in news, politics and pop culture.

programme.title: Yellowstone (S3) Ep8
programme.desc: I Killed a Man Today - Beth fires back against their financial adversary by shorting their stock, sending it plummeting. Monica assists authorities as missing person cases start mounting. Wade sends John Dutton a message.

programme.title: Saturday Night Live (S48) Ep1
programme.desc: Miles Teller - From pop culture parodies to political satire, SNL has produced unforgettable characters and catchphrases, whilst playing host to some of the biggest names in entertainment.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: Tom Cruise returns to his role as Ethan Hunt in the second installment of MISSION: IMPOSSIBLE.

programme.title: The Daily Show (S28) Ep16
programme.desc: Trevor Noah and The Daily Show correspondents tackle the biggest stories in news, politics and pop culture.

programme.title: Comedy Central Roast of Alec Baldwin
programme.desc: Roast Master Sean Hayes, along with Robert De Niro, Caitlyn Jenner, Blake Griffin, Jeff Ross, Nikki Glaser and more, team up to take down one of Hollywood's biggest stars.

programme.title: Asian Storytellers
programme.desc: A curated playlist of short films showcasing the works of filmmakers in Asia.

programme.title: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
programme.desc: After a high-tech, secret weapon is stolen by the mysterious and evil Cobra organization, the G.I. Joes must race against time to stop Cobra from using the weapon and plunging the world into chaos.

programme.title: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: The Serene Squall - While on a dangerous humanitarian mission, the crew of the U.S.S. Enterprise stumbles into a harrowing game of leverage with the quadrant's deadliest space pirate.

programme.title: For Heaven's Sake (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: The Man - Harold's status as a bachelor and recluse is challenged as Mike and Jackson sift through old family photos and letters, speculating that an important relationship may have been overlooked.

programme.title: Gemini Man
programme.desc: An aging NSA agent who's targeted for death when he tries to retire discovers his assassin is a younger cloned version of himself.

programme.title: Greta's Wedding
programme.desc: Greta is set to marry in a week. Shortly before the big day, she discovers that her divorce papers with her ex-husband have a legal mistake. She goes to great lengths to rectify it – but little does she know that her life will be derailed in ways unimagined.

programme.title: Spin
programme.desc: SPIN seeks to explore circumstance versus choice, breaking points, and second chances through the lives of two men in the city and their incidental yet preordained meeting in a one-way alley that would change their lives thereafter.

programme.title: Arranged
programme.desc: In the secular environment of a Brooklyn school, an Orthodox Jew and a Muslim teacher find solace in one another as they navigate many roadblocks – from facing discrimination by the principal against their religious attire to arranged marriages.

programme.title: Needle Park Baby
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Michelle Halbneer, “Needle Park Baby” recounts the unbelievable story of an eleven-year-old girl and a childhood growing up with heroin addicted parents set in Platzspitzpark, Zurich’s public drug scene in the nineties.

programme.title: The Penguin Move
programme.desc: In this rib-tickling inspirational film, Bruno is a thirty year-old new father but he still feels unfulfilled. That is until he discovers the sport of curling and decides to take on the audacious goal of forming a team to participate in the Olympics.

programme.title: Instinct
programme.desc: Nicoline is the psychologist in charge of rehabilitating Idris, a serial sex offender. He tries hard to convince her of his renewed goodness, only to be constantly rejected by her. A disturbing but sickeningly alluring power play develops between them.

programme.title: Within The Whirlwind
programme.desc: A true story: Evegnia Ginzburg was a literature professor until the madness of Stalin’s Great Purge happened and landed her in a gulag. With the help of a loving camp doctor and poetry, she shows that one can possess dignity in the face of suffering.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Embassy Attack
programme.desc: When terrorists seize the German embassy in Tunis, Karla discovers Esra, her young protegé, is a double agent belonging to the terrorist group. Can she use her personal connection with the young woman to avoid a massacre?

programme.title: The Wallet
programme.desc: A story of a hardworking young man who struggles to provide for the needs of his younger sibling and how the younger sibling shows his gratitude with a gift.

programme.title: The Etruscan Smile
programme.desc: Neil is a rugged and hostile Scotsman who enjoys solitary life. When he’s forced to seek medical treatment in America, he begrudgingly moves in with his son who tries to connect with him. Yet, it is his grandson who ultimately stirs his hardened heart.

programme.title: The Best Of Dorien B.
programme.desc: 37-year old Dorien seemed to have a perfect life - she has a flourishing veterinary practice, two sweet kids and a successful husband. After everything suddenly fell apart, she must rediscover herself in order to escape the chaos which is now her life.

programme.title: Dafne
programme.desc: Dafne is a witty and independent young woman with Down Syndrome. When her mother dies suddenly, her father, Luigi, tumbles into depression. Instead of Luigi as her caretaker, she takes charge and shakes her father up, helping both of them heal.

programme.title: The Coroner: The Miracle
programme.desc: The mutilated corpse of a young girl buried alive is found in a cemetery. Known as a saint who could heal the sick, detectives look into the details of her “holy” reputation. Faith, superstition and trickery – the line between each is razor thin.

programme.title: Gold Runner
programme.desc: After getting robbed, Reza loses his job delivering gold from workshops to jewellery stores. Together with his friend, Reza devises a plan to get back on his feet by finding a legendary diamond at the bottom of an enormous septic tank.

programme.title: Parents Home Alone: The Schroeders
programme.desc: With their youngest son Max’s graduation over, Sabine and Bernd find themselves alone with one another. But this new stage of life comes with teething challenges: both have their own dreams and they will have to compromise for one another.

programme.title: The Etruscan Smile
programme.desc: Neil is a rugged and hostile Scotsman who enjoys solitary life. When he’s forced to seek medical treatment in America, he begrudgingly moves in with his son who tries to connect with him. Yet, it is his grandson who ultimately stirs his hardened heart.

programme.title: It Can't Be Real
programme.desc: A sobering film about moving on from childhood traumas – jazz singer Leyla grew up in a broken and dysfunctional family. A chance encounter with a mysterious photographer Murat unhinges her deep-seated pessimism in life and teaches her how to love again.

programme.title: Difret
programme.desc: A true story. 14-year-old Hirut is on her way home when men on horses swoop in and kidnap her. She fought back but accidently killed her would-be husband. Tenacious young lawyer Meza’s decision to defend Hirut threatens not only her career but her life.

programme.title: My Beautiful Country
programme.desc: Kosovo, 1999. The young Serbian widow Danica gives refuge to an injured Albanian soldier despite knowing that it would endanger her family. A love, one that defies ethnic antagonism and embodies resilience, blossoms between them like a flower in a drought.

programme.title: The Lady Diplomat: The Embassy Attack
programme.desc: When terrorists seize the German embassy in Tunis, Karla discovers Esra, her young protegé, is a double agent belonging to the terrorist group. Can she use her personal connection with the young woman to avoid a massacre?

programme.title: Adam
programme.desc: Abla runs a modest local bakery from her home in Casablanca where she lives alone with her 8-year-old daughter, Warda. When Samia, a young pregnant woman knocks on their door, Abla is far from imagining that her life will change forever.

programme.title: Gold Runner
programme.desc: After getting robbed, Reza loses his job delivering gold from workshops to jewellery stores. Together with his friend, Reza devises a plan to get back on his feet by finding a legendary diamond at the bottom of an enormous septic tank.

programme.title: A Summer in Croatia
programme.desc: Ena’s fiancé cancels the planned wedding - but just then she learns that she has a family in Croatia. At the sea, under the southern sun, she not only meets her loving grandmother but also a hostile sister-in-law and a romantically inclined fisherman.

programme.title: Leander's Final Journey
programme.desc: In this drama about reconciling the past with the present and the power of hope, a former WWII officer travels to Ukraine with his granddaughter to find the only woman he ever loved - just as a new war breaks out in the former Soviet Union in 2014.

programme.title: Parents Home Alone: The Schroeders
programme.desc: With their youngest son Max’s graduation over, Sabine and Bernd find themselves alone with one another. But this new stage of life comes with teething challenges: both have their own dreams and they will have to compromise for one another.

programme.title: Parents Home Alone: The Winters
programme.desc: The Winters family undergoes an upheaval when Marie, the daughter, relocates to Berlin. Tanja plans on divorcing Matthias, leaving him with a wounded pride. He fights to save his marriage but fails, until he rediscovers a new perspective in life.

programme.title: Adam
programme.desc: Abla runs a modest local bakery from her home in Casablanca where she lives alone with her 8-year-old daughter, Warda. When Samia, a young pregnant woman knocks on their door, Abla is far from imagining that her life will change forever.

programme.title: Lilly's Bewitched Christmas
programme.desc: Young Lilly summons Ruprecht, a nasty helper from her fairy tale book, to teach her naughty brother a lesson. However, when Ruprecht starts wreaking havoc, she is forced to time travel back to the Middle Ages to find a way to reverse the spell.

programme.title: Leander's Final Journey
programme.desc: In this drama about reconciling the past with the present and the power of hope, a former WWII officer travels to Ukraine with his granddaughter to find the only woman he ever loved - just as a new war breaks out in the former Soviet Union in 2014.

programme.title: Love And Other Accidents
programme.desc: Marie is a single mother, saddled with bank debts and running a farm. Philip, manager of the bank, goes to her farm to foreclose it but crashes his car upon arrival. Capitalising on Peter’s resultant amnesia, Marie convinces him that he is her husband.

programme.title: Macondo
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Chechen boy Ramasan grows up in Macondo, a refugee settlement on the outskirts of Vienna. Living alone with his mother and two little sisters, Ramasan takes over the role of the father assuming the responsibility for his small family.

programme.title: A Summer in Croatia
programme.desc: Ena’s fiancé cancels the planned wedding - but just then she learns that she has a family in Croatia. At the sea, under the southern sun, she not only meets her loving grandmother but also a hostile sister-in-law and a romantically inclined fisherman.

programme.title: Vivere
programme.desc: Married couple, Luca and Susi, are facing problems at work and they struggle to support their family of four. When Mary, their new au pair arrives, her presence lights up the dull household and her beauty captivates the lovestruck Luca and his son.

programme.title: A Summer in Vietnam: Part 1
programme.desc: Paula’s fresh start in Vietnam is a disaster: Her passport is confiscated, the appointment for her job falls through, and she ends up in the hospital after her handbag is stolen. The revelation that she has a twin sister there turns her world upside down.

programme.title: The Boss In The Kitchen
programme.desc: In this rib-tickling comedy, the Coso family lives an under-the-radar life in a small Italian town. However, when their uncle Cyrus, who has been put under house arrest for mafia crimes, arrive at their doorstep, their quiet lives are disrupted.

programme.title: Animals Unleashed S1 52

programme.title: Veronica Mars S1 1
programme.desc: In the wealthy, seaside community of Neptune, the rich and powerful make the rules. They own the town and the high school, and they desperately try to keep their dirty little secrets just that...secret. Unfortunately for them, there's Veronica Mars (series star KRISTEN BELL), a smart, fearless 17-year-old apprentice private investigator dedicated to solving the town's toughest mysteries.

programme.desc: Veronica and Wallace don't believe in the evidence against Weevil, who has been arrested for stealing credit card applications from Logan's family, and launch an investigation to help their new ally. Meanwhile, after joining Ms. Mallory Dent's (series star SYDNEY TAMIIA POITIER) journalism class, Veronica clashes with socialite Caitlin Ford (PARIS HILTON - "The Simple Life 2"), Logan's sexy new girlfriend. The young investigator is intrigued by the attention shown to her by another wealthy student, Troy Vandegraff (recurring guest star AARON ASHMORE), a friend of her ex-boyfriend Duncan. Later, Veronica learns that Lilly got a ticket while driving her car on the day she died--two hours after her supposed time of death.

He acts like a jerk and hooks up with another passenger (Lola Falana) and doesn't tell her what he does. Among the other passengers is a woman (Donna Mills), searching for her birth mother, who is also on the cruise, and she wants to go see her but is too afraid to. She meets another passenger (David Birney) and they hit it off. A rich girl (Barbi Benton), who just got dumped at the altar, is very mean and Doc (Bernie Kopell) sets out to help her. A couple (Edie Adams and Avery Schreiber) who are in a rut and are considering separating

programme.title: Bewitched S2 Ep05
programme.desc: The Joker Is A Card - When Samantha's peaceful dinner is ruined by Endora's jokes, her Uncle Arthur came for a visit. Arthur teaches Darrin a spell to teach Endora a lesson.

programme.title: Cheers S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Endless Slumper - Sam loans out his lucky cap to a baseball player who’s in a slump.

programme.title: Little House: Look Back To Yesterday
programme.desc: Little House: Look Back To Yesterday - Medical student Albert returns to Walnut Grove only to face a potentially fatal blood disease. Looking back to better days at home, Albert gains strength and with courage survives his disease.

programme.title: I Dream of Jeannie S2 Ep28
programme.desc: My Master, Napolean's Buddy - Tony can't change the course of history when Jeannie takes him to Napoleon's court.

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote S6 Ep04
programme.desc: The Error Of Her Ways - The puzzling suicide of a woman (Kathy Cannon) who has been charged with her husband's murder prompts Jessica (Angela Lansbury) to question her guilt.

programme.title: Little House: Bless All The Dear Children
programme.desc: Little House: Bless All The Dear Children - Laura and Almanzo went looking for Rose who was kidnapped. Watch as a young orphan looks for a home and a wish by Jason Carter to give his mother a happy Christmas are all part of this wonderful story.

programme.title: Columbo S5 Ep04
programme.desc: A Matter of Honor - Fierce competition among bullfighters involves Columbo in a murder investigation.

programme.title: The Lucy Show S6 Ep07
programme.desc: Lucy, the Philanthropist - Lucy befriends a kindly old man, Mr. Snowden, she finds sitting on a bench in Griffith Park. At first, Mr. Mooney shuns snowden but when he is led to believe that the old man is an eccentric millionaire, goes all out to make him comfortable and happy, much to Lucy's chagrin.

programme.title: I Dream of Jeannie S2 Ep28
programme.desc: My Master, Napolean's Buddy - Tony can't change the course of history when Jeannie takes him to Napoleon's court.

programme.title: The Love Boat S2 Ep02

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep01
programme.desc: Too Many Cooks - A new batch of wounded arrive and one of them is Private Conway, who is quickly becoming known as the world’s clumsiest foot soldier. The tall and ungainly Conway is rather downhearted his clumsiness makes him such a useless soldier, until Klinger discovers Conway’s hidden talent and Conway quickly becomes a most treasured 4077th guest. Conway may be a klutz on the battle field but he is a genius in the kitchen, and soon the mess hall is filled with happy diners. Hawkeye, B.J., Hot Lips and the gang are soon swooning over the delicious meals and are surprised Col. Potter isn’t more enthusiastic. What they don’t know is that Potter has gotten a message from Mildred which has him considering retirement.

programme.title: M*A*S*H S8 Ep02
programme.desc: Are You Now, Margaret? - Congressional aide R.P. Williamson arrives at the 4077th for a fact-finding tour and it is soon discovered that his agenda is less about facts and more about fiction when he accuses the red, white, and blue Hot Lips of being a communist sympathizer. Hot Lips discovers the source of the suspicion stems from a friendship she had while in college some years ago and is incensed that she is being scrutinized in such a manner. All of her M*A*S*H cohorts are equally up in arms and encourage her to confront her accuser. When Margaret tries to discuss the matter, Williamson hints that he would drop the inquisition completely in exchange for certain favors from her. Luckily for Hot Lips, Klinger captures the entire incident on film.

programme.title: Peace & Prosperity Ep175
programme.desc: Following three inter-Korean summits and two North Korea-U.S. summits, a journey towards peace on the Korean Peninsula has become irreversible. 2019 will see countless twists and turns in negotiations, as all parties involved work to build a lasting peace in search for a winning solution for all. No longer a simply political, abstract notion, peace is now an imperative that leads to the prosperity of the Korean Peninsula and the international community. Arirang TV launches the new program "Peace and Prosperity" to explore paths to peace and prosperity, with a special emphasis on the expected role of Seoul.

programme.title: Spectacular Earth S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lightning - In Arizona, lightning strikes from so high above the ground, through such clear air, that it creates the perfect conditions for the most electrifying show on Earth. To uncover how and when they happen, witness a cloud-fall on Table Mountain in South Africa, climb a frozen waterfall in the Alps and visit the wildflower blooms of the South African veldt.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S4 Ep1
programme.desc: Ascension Island - Robson's journey begins on Ascension Island, a tiny outpost with underfished waters in the middle of the Atlantic Ocean.

programme.desc: Our Blue Planet - Human life has had a devastating impact on our oceans, but is it too late to save them? In this episode, scientists share their latest discoveries and reveal what the future holds for our oceans.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep21
programme.desc: Food for Tots is tasked with preparing 10,000 fresh and healthy lunches for 400 hundred childcare centres across the Toronto area. Homestyle Deserts has to work through the night on carrot cakes.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep22
programme.desc: A squad of Ohio taco artists is determined to win an annual food truck competition.

programme.desc: Africa - The latest series from the BBC and Sir David Attenborough explores the continent of Africa - home to the greatest wildlife gatherings on Earth. But even in this land of plenty, wildlife faces huge challenges.

programme.title: Coastal Fishing with Robson Green S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Welsh Pembrokeshire - Robson travels around the Welsh Pembrokeshire coast where he goes in search of Seabass.

programme.desc: Portugal - Adventurer Ben Fogle journeys to the mountains of central Portugal, to live with Alex, a British man who traded in his lucrative retail career for his own mountainside hideaway. Later, Ben lollipops trees to protect them from forest fires.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Patagonia - Robson's journey continues in Patagonia, where he goes on the hunt for the massive Chinook Salmon.

programme.desc: Welsh Pembrokeshire - Robson travels around the Welsh Pembrokeshire coast where he goes in search of Seabass.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep23
programme.desc: A Las Vegas crew has just one night to finish a two-day job. Tackling several last-minute wedding cakes they've got no margin for error.

programme.title: Food Factory S5 Ep24
programme.desc: A mega fish order form Harvard university means an early start for a crew of fishermen.

programme.title: Attenborough and The Mammoth Graveyard S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sir David Attenborough joins an archaeological dig uncovering Britain's biggest mammoth discovery in almost 20 years. In 2017, in a gravel quarry near Swindon, two amateur fossil hunters found an extraordinary cache of Ice Age mammoth remains. Could the Neanderthals have killed these Ice Age giants?

programme.title: Tribal Bootcamp S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Kodo - Joel and Nish enrol in the Kodo drumming school on a remote island in Japan. To pass, students must wake up at dawn every morning to exercise, do chores and drum all day.

programme.title: Secrets of the Superfactories S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Cars, chips, toys and toilets. Behind the scenes at Maserati, Frito-Lay, Bandai and Armitage Shanks, we see how these useful products are innovatively produced.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Papua New Guinea - Papua New Guinea is home to a rare fishing prize - often called the best freshwater fighting fish on the planet: the Papuan Black Bass.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty Ep6
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ultimate Predator Ep1
programme.desc: Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey’s heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Return of the Light Ep2
programme.desc: Arctic foxes raise cubs on Iceland’s volcanic shores. Finding food proves challenging until one fox learns to hunt new prey. In Shetland the otter cub strikes out alone and his mother finds a new mate. In Norway reindeer calves take their first steps.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - The River Troop Ep5
programme.desc: Along the bank of the Luangwa River in Zambia lives a large troop of baboons. Despite the difficulties of the dry season, baby baboons are born. This is the story of a young male baboon who faces difficult choices as he comes of age.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - Pride Lands Ep6
programme.desc: Spend one day and one night in Zambia’s Luangwa Valley with Africa’s most fearsome hunters-a pride of lions. The lions are hungry because they haven’t managed to make a large kill in days and tempers are starting to flare.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Social Animals Ep5
programme.desc: Cooperation comes in many forms. Some animals cooperate to be social while others put the welfare of the group above their own reproductive potential. See the many ways species have evolved to work with one another in order to survive.

programme.title: Rewilding 1 - Hidden Gem of the North Ep2
programme.desc: The Steinhuder Meer in the heart of northern Germany is a biodiversity-hotspot in Germany, not far from Hamburg. Different habitats, such as fenlands, alder march, wetlands, and dunes ensure that the largest shallow lake in Germany is extremely attractive to a great variety of different animals, but that's not all: The richly textured landscape is the ideal outdoor laboratory for biologists who operate Germany's significant reintroduction of wildlife.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Hollywoods Held Hostage Ep5
programme.desc: During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty Ep6
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ultimate Predator Ep1
programme.desc: Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey’s heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.desc: Arctic foxes raise cubs on Iceland’s volcanic shores. Finding food proves challenging until one fox learns to hunt new prey. In Shetland the otter cub strikes out alone and his mother finds a new mate. In Norway reindeer calves take their first steps.

programme.desc: Spend one day and one night in Zambia’s Luangwa Valley with Africa’s most fearsome hunters-a pride of lions. The lions are hungry because they haven’t managed to make a large kill in days and tempers are starting to flare.
