programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 - Body Language Ep1
programme.desc: Join researchers as they study how animals communicate. Find out how wolves use their body language to unite the pack and maintain a sophisticated social structure, and see the astounding number of gestures chimps use to communicate.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Ancient Lineages Ep6
programme.desc: Some call them “living fossils”, but that's just another way to say survivors. From the shark to the horseshoe crab, these animals' early adaptations were a success, leaving them relatively unchanged for millions of years.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - Hollywoods Held Hostage Ep5
programme.desc: During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Big Cat Country 1 - The Next Dynasty Ep6
programme.desc: The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ultimate Predator Ep1
programme.desc: Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey’s heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Return of the Light Ep2
programme.desc: Arctic foxes raise cubs on Iceland’s volcanic shores. Finding food proves challenging until one fox learns to hunt new prey. In Shetland the otter cub strikes out alone and his mother finds a new mate. In Norway reindeer calves take their first steps.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - The River Troop Ep5
programme.desc: Along the bank of the Luangwa River in Zambia lives a large troop of baboons. Despite the difficulties of the dry season, baby baboons are born. This is the story of a young male baboon who faces difficult choices as he comes of age.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - Pride Lands Ep6
programme.desc: Spend one day and one night in Zambia’s Luangwa Valley with Africa’s most fearsome hunters-a pride of lions. The lions are hungry because they haven’t managed to make a large kill in days and tempers are starting to flare.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Madagascar Ep1
programme.desc: Madagascar is home to strange animals not found anywhere else on Earth. When these animals fight for supremacy, their battles are just as strange - from weird neck-wrestling weevils to ring-tailed lemur moms that go into battle with baby on board.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Australia Ep2
programme.desc: Australia is home to an eclectic array of creatures, and the ways to succeed as an alpha are just as diverse. The beach turns into a dueling ground, and the outback becomes a boxing ring, as animals face off with their own kind.

programme.title: Rewilding 1 - Andalucia's Struggle Ep3
programme.desc: Andalusia is a mosaic of extreme habitats. From the deserted Almeria-region to the snowy mountaintops of the Sierra Nevada, from the dried-out ilex woodlands of the Sierra Morena to the nebulous cork oak forests near Cadiz and Granada’s shrub–covered cliffs. Over the course of histories human settling and hunting had a fundamental impact on these landscapes and their fauna. But today, many of the animals found in Andalusia have found innovative survival strategies and niches that allow them to reclaim Andalusia (only in some cases with a little help of humans).

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 - Rumble in the Jungle Ep2
programme.desc: Tune into the natural world and explore frequencies beyond human hearing, like the gentle hum of giraffes in the evening, or creatures who use song to claim territory on a seemingly silent coral reef.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ocean Voyagers Ep2
programme.desc: Navigate the ocean’s vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Children of the Storm Ep3
programme.desc: In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - The River Troop Ep5
programme.desc: Along the bank of the Luangwa River in Zambia lives a large troop of baboons. Despite the difficulties of the dry season, baby baboons are born. This is the story of a young male baboon who faces difficult choices as he comes of age.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - Pride Lands Ep6
programme.desc: Spend one day and one night in Zambia’s Luangwa Valley with Africa’s most fearsome hunters-a pride of lions. The lions are hungry because they haven’t managed to make a large kill in days and tempers are starting to flare.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ocean Voyagers Ep2
programme.desc: Navigate the ocean’s vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Children of the Storm Ep3
programme.desc: In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of the Dingo Ep2
programme.desc: This wild dog has been on Australia’s shores for at least three-and-a-half-thousand years and is believed to be descended from the Asian wolf; but canis lupus dingo is a distinct species, different from both the wolf and the domestic dog.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of the Crocodiles Ep3
programme.desc: Lurking in the waterways of Queensland and the Northern Territory live the largest living reptiles on Earth; they’re among the most dangerous animals in Australia. Crocodiles are formidable predators, superbly adapted to aquatic life, with skull crushing jaws and lightning speed. They were on earth long before the dinosaurs, and have outlived them by millions of years. Now they’re protected in Australia and their numbers have surged in recent years.

From the deserted Almeria-region to the snowy mountaintops of the Sierra Nevada, from the dried-out ilex woodlands of the Sierra Morena to the nebulous cork oak forests near Cadiz and Granada’s shrub–covered cliffs. Over the course of histories human settling and hunting had a fundamental impact on these landscapes and their fauna. But today, many of the animals found in Andalusia have found innovative survival strategies and niches that allow them to reclaim Andalusia (only in some cases with a little help of humans).

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 - Rumble in the Jungle Ep2
programme.desc: Tune into the natural world and explore frequencies beyond human hearing, like the gentle hum of giraffes in the evening, or creatures who use song to claim territory on a seemingly silent coral reef.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Australia Ep2
programme.desc: Australia is home to an eclectic array of creatures, and the ways to succeed as an alpha are just as diverse. The beach turns into a dueling ground, and the outback becomes a boxing ring, as animals face off with their own kind.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - The River Troop Ep5
programme.desc: Along the bank of the Luangwa River in Zambia lives a large troop of baboons. Despite the difficulties of the dry season, baby baboons are born. This is the story of a young male baboon who faces difficult choices as he comes of age.

programme.title: Tales from Zambia 1 - Pride Lands Ep6
programme.desc: Spend one day and one night in Zambia’s Luangwa Valley with Africa’s most fearsome hunters-a pride of lions. The lions are hungry because they haven’t managed to make a large kill in days and tempers are starting to flare.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - Ocean Voyagers Ep2
programme.desc: Navigate the ocean’s vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Children of the Storm Ep3
programme.desc: In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of the Dingo Ep2
programme.desc: This wild dog has been on Australia’s shores for at least three-and-a-half-thousand years and is believed to be descended from the Asian wolf; but canis lupus dingo is a distinct species, different from both the wolf and the domestic dog.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of the Crocodiles Ep3
programme.desc: Lurking in the waterways of Queensland and the Northern Territory live the largest living reptiles on Earth; they’re among the most dangerous animals in Australia. Crocodiles are formidable predators, superbly adapted to aquatic life, with skull crushing jaws and lightning speed. They were on earth long before the dinosaurs, and have outlived them by millions of years. Now they’re protected in Australia and their numbers have surged in recent years.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - Savanna Ep3
programme.desc: The African savanna is an epic landscape, and whether it’s head-bashing hippos, hormone-crazed elephants or dueling lions, battles that rage on the savanna are just as epic.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 - India Ep4
programme.desc: Welcome to India – a land of exotic animals and exotic warfare. Monkeys stage dusty dust-ups, blackbucks wage open war on the open plains, and peacock dandies swing switchblades: these are colorful battles worthy of a vibrant land.

programme.title: Gangs of Lemur Island 1 - Battle Lines Ep1
programme.desc: As the dry season approaches, tensions rise on Lemur Island, both between rival gangs and within their own ranks. Get a view from the battlefield as the female leaders fiercely defend their turf, while their newborn infants cling to them for safety.

programme.title: Animals Decoded 1 - Invisible Signals Ep3
programme.desc: Could undiscovered animal languages save some of our most endangered species? From subtle scents to colors that are invisible to the human eye, uncover the hidden ways creatures communicate, which scientists are only starting to understand.

programme.title: Planet Shark 1 - In the Extreme Ep3
programme.desc: Follow a host of sharks with extraordinary abilities that allow them to thrive in the most adverse conditions around the globe. Observe nearly blind Greenland sharks made for life in freezing Arctic waters, and another species that can walk on land.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Tsiba's New Mum Ep4
programme.desc: Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelope’s tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.title: Secrets of Wild Australia 1 - Secret Life of the Dingo Ep2
programme.desc: This wild dog has been on Australia’s shores for at least three-and-a-half-thousand years and is believed to be descended from the Asian wolf; but canis lupus dingo is a distinct species, different from both the wolf and the domestic dog.

programme.title: Rooted 1 - Rock Splitter Ep4
programme.desc: The Namaqua Rock Fig Tree stands rooted on the slope of a rocky hill in Namaqualand, South Africa. It is the ultimate survivor, able to withstand the unforgiving conditions in a landscape facing ever rising temperatures and less and less rainfall each year.

programme.title: Rooted 1 - The Hollow Heart Ep5

programme.title: Airport 24/7: Miami S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Sharks On A Plane - MIA hurries to get sharks in the air and a race car duels a jet.

programme.title: Airport 24/7: Miami S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Storm Season - MIA takes on traffic from a shut down airport diverted due to a storm.

programme.title: 36 Hours S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Beachin In Barcelona - Kristen Kish and Kyle Martino dive right into Europe's coastline gem, Barcelona.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown: Over The Edge
programme.desc: Expedition Unknown: Over The Edge - Josh Gates shares his favorite moments from season three that didn't make the final cut, including never-before-seen footage, expanded scenes and more.

programme.title: Bert The Conqueror S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Alberta Canada - Concrete toboggans are raced to crown the king of the hill in Canada. Bert bungees 10-stories into a pool and rides a triple loop coaster - all inside a shopping mall.

programme.title: Bert The Conqueror S2 Ep8
programme.desc: New Mexico - Bert rides a shovel down the steep and treacherous course at the Shovel Race Championships. Extreme family tubing provides monstrous jumps and sharp navigation.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Into Bigfoots Den - When Russell films a shocking piece of video evidence, the whole team assembles to follow the trail. Their search culminates in a monumental discovery.

programme.desc: Sharks On A Plane - MIA hurries to get sharks in the air and a race car duels a jet.

programme.title: Airport 24/7: Miami S3 Ep2
programme.desc: Storm Season - MIA takes on traffic from a shut down airport diverted due to a storm.

programme.title: Mysterious Islands S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Island Of Eternal Life - Kelle's journey takes her to the far side of the planet to the Indonesian island of Sulawesi, one of the oldest islands on Earth.

programme.title: Mysterious Islands S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Island Where Women Rule - Kellee travels to South Korea's Jeju Island to look into the mysterious reason it's known as the "island of dominant women."

programme.title: The Exorcism Of Roland Doe S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Exorcism Of Roland Doe - The Exorcist has terrified audiences since 1973, but few know the story is true.

programme.title: 36 Hours S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Beachin In Barcelona - Kristen Kish and Kyle Martino dive right into Europe's coastline gem, Barcelona.

programme.title: Airport 24/7: Miami S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Dogs, Guns & Gold - President Obama comes to MIA; CBP strikes gold in a high value carry-on.

programme.title: Airport 24/7: Miami S3 Ep4
programme.desc: What Not To Say At Mia - MIA kitchens prep thousands of meals for outgoing flights, while one passenger discovers what happens when you say "bomb" at the airport.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown: Over The Edge
programme.desc: Expedition Unknown: Over The Edge - Josh Gates shares his favorite moments from season three that didn't make the final cut, including never-before-seen footage, expanded scenes and more.

programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Into Bigfoots Den - When Russell films a shocking piece of video evidence, the whole team assembles to follow the trail. Their search culminates in a monumental discovery.

programme.title: Bert The Conqueror S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Alaska - The biggest and best outhouse race is on tap at the Rondy Fest in Alaska, as Bert races his outhouse down the slippery and icy roads.

programme.title: Bert The Conqueror S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Arizona - Bert is in Arizona to compete in a chariot race. To win this race, Bert will have to successfully maneuver an ostrich strapped to his chariot.

programme.title: The Exorcism Of Roland Doe S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Exorcism Of Roland Doe - The Exorcist has terrified audiences since 1973, but few know the story is true.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown: Josh's Favorite Things
programme.desc: Expedition Unknown: Josh's Favorite Things - Josh Gates takes a break from his travels to show a few of his favorite people, places, experiences and eats from his many expeditions.

programme.title: Beach Hunters S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Alabama Gulf Coast Getaway - Empty nesters hunt the sugar sand the beaches of Fairhope, AL, for a Gulf Coast retreat.

programme.title: Beach Hunters S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Washington Coast House Hunt - A Montana family leaves their landlocked state for a Pacific Coast beach home in Ferndale, WA.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters S14 Ep1
programme.desc: The Haunted Brewery - TAPS head to a church-turned-brewery in Pittsburgh with mysterious hauntings. The team investigate an accidental death that took place on the property.

programme.desc: X Tiesto. Check out these awesome vids from three superstar DJs, Calvin Harris, David Guetter and Tiesto!

programme.title: Hot Right Now!
programme.desc: We bring you the very hottest music videos in the world right now!

programme.title: Global Beats!
programme.desc: Tune in for a selection of the biggest Hip-Hop, RnB and Reggaeton beats that are taking over the world!

programme.title: The Rock Zone!
programme.desc: You are now entering the rock zone! Expect nothing but the biggest, loudest, hottest rock tunes to ever exist!

programme.title: World Stage: Isle of MTV 2022...
programme.desc: Highlights. Enjoy the very best from this year's Isle of MTV!

programme.title: MTV World Stage: Jason Derulo
programme.desc: MTV World Stage is your chance to see the biggest artists on the globe live in concert without leaving the comfort of your sofa.

programme.title: HD Hits!
programme.desc: We've got big hits and they're even bigger in high def baby!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep21
programme.desc: Packet Racket / Smack Me Down - When a shady group of bugs moves into the city selling artificial ketchup, Turbo and Shadow go undercover to expose who is behind the operation. // After Turbo is challenged to compete in an underground smack-talk contest, he must get lessons from the best insult snail there is, Burn.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep21
programme.desc: Water - The Dinotrux crew builds an aqueduct to bring water back to the Flatirons during a drought, but D-Structs tries to sabotage their plan.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? S2 Ep21
programme.desc: It'S On Like Amazon! - Wally and Wenda go on a mission to return the borrowed Quick Bloom Key to its owner, an Amazon-dwelling wizard named Vinebeard. But Odlulu intercepts the key so she can use its magic for her lemonade stand. Using local trails, Wally and Wenda must track Odlulu through the jungle. They'll have to raft the Amazon and brave Odlulu's ""living"" plants to complete their mission

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever S1 Ep21
programme.desc: I Wanna Crush Your Hand - When Lotta goes to the Crush 4U concert, she gets a chance to meet the band but makes a bad first impression and goes through great lengths for a second chance. Frufru declares that she doesn't believe in climate change and Dot sets out to change her mind.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Lucky And The Impatient Patient - While Spirit recovers from his injuries, Lucky helps out at the soda shop.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Deja Flu / Crackridge Live - It's Archibald to the rescue when Loy, Sage and Finly come down with a bad case of the Déjà Flu. Archibald and Cousin Ashley take over the airwaves.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Hot, Hot, Hot - Aggro is embarrassed about big changes she's going through. And when she gets stuck in a volcano, the Rescue Riders seek help from ... Magnus?

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep47
programme.desc: No Age Like The Present / So Garfelt - Oh creates a boov-tech machine that makes Tip and Lucy the same age/When Tip is fired from Garbage, she gets a new job at Garfeldt's fish stand

programme.title: Captain Underpants Special 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Heartbreaking Havoc Of The Haunting Hackaween Special - When Melvin and Krupp conspire to cancel Halloween, George and Harold need to remind their parents why Halloween was fun in the first place. But Melvin catches wind of their plan and uses his Inanimaniatator 2000 to turn the kids’ haunted house into real horrors! After summoning Captain Underpants to fight the monsters off, the boys find that Krupp and Melvin have gone one step further. Halloween isn't just cancelled - it's now ILLEGAL! George and Harold team up with their friends and hack their favorite holiday, creating Hack-a-ween! They’ll wear disguises instead of costumes, carve cabbages instead of pumpkins, and get snacks instead of candy. The new holiday is a hit! But when Melvin fights back, George and Harold realize that in order to beat him, they may ultimately have to make peace with him.

programme.title: Scared Shrekless Ep1
programme.desc: Scared Shrekless - Shrek gets in the Halloween spirit by challenging his fairytale friends to come up with scary stories for a contest. But the gang learn that they'll have to spend the night in Lord Farquaad's haunted castle before the winner is named.

programme.title: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf Ep1
programme.desc: The Pig Who Cried Werewolf - The Three Pigs live in a house together, but Heimlich gets scared when he sees Wolf move in next door and acting strange.

programme.title: Night Of The Living Carrots Ep1
programme.desc: Night Of The Living Carrots - On Halloween, a mutant alien pumpkin explodes in a carrot garden and zombie carrots rise up, bite the townspeople, and take over their minds. B.O.B., Dr. Cockroach and The Missing Link join forces to take on the zombie carrots.

programme.title: The Ghost Of Lord Farquaad Ep1
programme.desc: Ghost Of Lord Farquaad, The (Shrek 4-D) - Shrek, Fiona, and Donkey are on their way to the hotel where Shrek and Fiona will spend their honeymoon when they encounter Lord Farquaad's ghost!

programme.title: Far Far Away Idol Ep1
programme.desc: Far Far Away Idol - Watch your favorite Shrek characters sing the night away in this hilarious spoof. Join in the fun as Fiona, Puss in Boots, Donkey and the rest of the Far Far Away Kingdom battle it out in a singer's showdown.

programme.title: Monsters Vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins From Outer Space Ep1
programme.desc: Monsters Vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins From Outer Space - Susan Murphy (a.k.a. Ginormica) and the Monsters are now working with the US government as special ops. So when an alien presence is detected in Susan's hometown of Modesto, California -- right before Halloween -- the team is dispatched to investigate. Everything appears normal, right down to the jack-o-lanterns peering out from every doorstep and windowsill. But when Halloween arrives, those innocent-looking carved pumpkins reveal themselves for what they really are mutant aliens. The altered pumpkins then start to implement their fiendish plan to take over Earth. The Monsters are there to combat the mutant gourds and try to smash their wicked scheme!

programme.title: Captain Underpants Special 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Heartbreaking Havoc Of The Haunting Hackaween Special - When Melvin and Krupp conspire to cancel Halloween, George and Harold need to remind their parents why Halloween was fun in the first place. programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep21
programme.desc: Night Of The White Bone Demon - In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep23
programme.desc: Ladies Night - Khepra, leader of the Cat Council, takes Cleo, Akila and Callie on a "Ladies' Night Out" at the arcade. Cleo hates it until Khepra picks a fight with some aliens. Then at least there's kicking.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep47
programme.desc: Friend Matching/Trolly Tales 3 - When a friend-matching quiz Poppy surreptitiously gives the Trolls reveals that Sky and Guy are a near perfect match, she sets out to make them friends! But her attempts to foster a relationship keep backfiring./Branch and Poppy try to entertain Trolls Village’s babies with a series of nursery rhymes. But, stalling for time, they expand each into a distinct, Trolls-y story.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep47
programme.desc: King Julien: Superstar! - Julien, Clover, Mort and Maurice become music sensations overnight, but the band breaks up over Julien and Clover's non-stop fighting

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Problematic Pandemonium Of The Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Plushythingy - When Frederic Estes creates the cutest plushy ever that is the hottest toy in town, the field team must destroy the last remaining one but are powerless against its cuteness

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep21
programme.desc: Spell - As he tries to restore the magic spell that will protect San Lorenzo, Puss accidentally brings Artephius's macramé owl shop to life.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep13
programme.desc: Outbreak/ Ancient Greek Games - Sherman accidentally finds the cure for a prehistoric bird flu turning everyone blue; Zeus's team of titans face off against a gawky geek squad.

programme.title: Trollhunters Ep21
programme.desc: Party Monster - NotEnrique throws a house party for the Trolls of Arcadia Jim and Tobys search for a way to remove Stricklers ring takes a surprising turn.

programme.desc: Edge Of Disaster Pt 1 - When Ruffnut is captured by Dragon Hunters, it's up to Astrid and Tuffnut to defend Dragon's Edge from the invading Dragon Hunter army Dragon's Edge from the invading Dragon Hunter army

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Rupert And The Cloud Shepherd - Rupert, Ping Pong, Bill and Ming help the Cloud Shepherd find some missing clouds that have sneaked away to play. But how can the friends get them back up into the sky?

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Rupert And The Magic Carpet - When Ming gets stuck up a tree, Rupert, Ping Pong and Bill try to rescue her but, thanks to Edward's mistakes, they all get stuck too. Can Edward overcome his fear of heights and save them?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep5
programme.desc: Zebby'S Snack Time - Zebby likes to have a snack when she is feeling tired. Raa Raa thinks this is a great idea and decides to join his friend. Except he thinks they should have their snack in the perfect place… but everywhere they try is just too noisy… I wonder why that could be?!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep6
programme.desc: Finding Noisy - Raa Raa gets carried away when collecting fun noisy objects in the jungle with his friends. Raa Raa wants to keep everything he finds for himself, but soon discovers that his collection isn't much fun with nobody to share it with.

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep5
programme.desc: Postman Pat’S Pancake Party - Pat must deliver eggs, milk, flour and butter to Greendale for the annual Pancake Race. But when Michael mixes all the ingredients together, Pat finds that he instead has to deal with a mixing bowl full to the brim with pancake mix... Meanwhile in Greendale, Sara's attempts at pancake-tossing aren't going well and she soon loses her pancake under the wheels of PC Selby's car. Even worse, Ted Glen's amazing Pancake Machine has run out of mix so Sara won't be able to run the race unless Pat can get to Greendale on time... But Pat gets waylaid by Alf's cows and the pancake mix ends up all over the road. Pat hurries back to Pencaster but Michael now only has butter and flour so Pat has to go and get eggs from Nisha and even some milk from Rosie the goat! With the race about to start, Pat arrives just in time with all the ingredients necessary for Ted to make Sara a fresh pancake. SDS Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep6
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Runaway Remote - Pat doesn't realise today's Special Delivery, a super all-in-one remote control, is quite as powerful as it is! As Jess falls asleep on the buttons, machines all around Pencaster start going haywire. Waiting for the remote, Charlie and Julian are installing a futuristic 'Shop a Bot 3000' robot sales assistant for Mrs Goggins, but they make the mistake of turning it on before the controller arrives. Pat struggles to make his delivery before the shop robot does too much damage!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep57
programme.desc: King Stingo - Aunt Tulip has lost Grubby again. When Stingo finds him, he asks to be made King as a reward. It isn't long before he has gone too far and the tots are all fed up with his demands. Can Fifi get life in the garden back to normal?

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep58
programme.desc: Hide And Seek - The tots are playing hide and seek and the winner will get Fifi's delicious jam tarts. Who will win, Stingo and Slugsy are sure it will be them!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Escape From Azka-Bash - Dennis must escape detention and Bash Street School to make the Beanotown Brawny Bean Race before Walter wins it! With the help of a note placed in his desk, he must sneak past Mrs Creecher and make a run for it – unless the mysterious note giver stops him first!

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher: Unleashed! S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Griller Thriller - Dennis’ ultimate hero, Grizzly Griller, plans on trekking to the source of the River Beano, broadcasting the treacherous path on live TV. Dennis introduces him to his pet hamster, Galahad – only to discover they are his biggest fear! Grizzly is so torn up that Dennis must disguise himself as his hero and go in his place!

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep29
programme.desc: The Hunted - Lotor seizes the opportunity and lures the Paladins to Thayserix, a mysterious gas planet

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep3
programme.desc: Stink Of Fear: Chapter Three - When Bullwinkle remembers he forgot the secret ingredient to his stinky pie recipe, he and Rocky travel to Norway and enlist the help of his beloved Grandwinkle, not knowing that they are being followed!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T Ep3
programme.desc: Bumperdome / Broaches - A near-accident gives Chet his first adrenaline rush, and in his quest for another he enters a dangerous race inside a pinball machine. // The FAST team must work together to keep a group of sewer surfing roaches from entering the taco stand so that Tito can pass his health inspection.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep22
programme.desc: Wind - A fierce windstorm traps the gang inside the garage and they have fun together all night, but once the food runs out they team up to find a way out.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing S1 Ep22
programme.desc: House Of The Future / Dr. Buttersocks - Loy upgrades the house with a few seemingly helpful robotic enhancements. Archibald becomes a sock-puppet wrestling superstar.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Bombastic Blathering Of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: Boss Baby Back In Business S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Picture Perfect - Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep22
programme.desc: Rise Of The Empress - On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Apple Of My Ire/Funsgiving - After all their adventures, Branch no longer finds Cloud Guy as annoying as he once did. But to Cloud Guy, this is an unacceptable betrayal of their adversarial relationship. Dejected, he sets out to find a new rival to annoy./Biggie is hosting Funsgiving this year, and is therefore charged with preparing all of the best dishes for his friends. But in his quest to make things perfect, he goes a little too far…

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep22
programme.desc: Baby Face Off/The Pursuit Of Wrinkliness - Thunk babysits Sandy and new baby Cliff to prove his responsible. Cliff is a jerk and keeps getting Sandy in trouble/Gran worries that Thunk isn't tough enough to survive to adulthood because he likes to hang out with old people, so she puts him through a series of toughness tests.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep21
programme.desc: Inside Jokings / It'S A Jungle In There - Tip and Oh make their first inside joke and Oh shares it with everyone; Tip watches Oh's new alien plant while he's gone and breeds a catastrophe.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Lucky And The Train Tycoon - While Lucky is eager to celebrate her first birthday on the frontier, a surprise visit from her Grandpa stirs up a controversy.

programme.title: Dragons Rescue Riders S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Hot, Hot, Hot - When a mama Ironclaw dragon gets caught high on a mountain with a broken wing, Hannahr the blacksmith has to confront her fear of heights to help out.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep17
programme.desc: Why Crocodile Has A Bumpy Back - You see there was a time when Crocodile didn't have a bumpy back. His skin was all smooth and he had to be very careful of the hot Tinga Tinga sun. One day whilst napping Crocodile gets very sunburnt and falls into a deep sleep. Lion warns all the animals to be on their guard as the Wildebeest have returned to Tinga Tinga and they could stampede at any moment. Crocodile misses the meeting, snoring under the hot sun. The animals try to warn snappy Crocodile… but it's too late and the Wildebeest stampede! OOOoof! …. All over Crocodile. From that day on Crocodile has a bumpy back and is grumpier and snappier than ever! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep18
programme.desc: Why Jackal Howls At The Moon - You see there was a time when Jackal didn't howl at the moon. He was a trickster and he always wanted what was not rightfully his. Jackal took over Hen's nest and Aardvark's burrow. He even took the cub's supper from Mama Cheetah! Enough was enough! All the animals decide to teach Jackal a lesson and make him believe that the Moon is made of the sweetest, most delicious honey in Tinga Tinga. Of course, Jackal instantly wants some… but it never comes. From that day on Jackal howls up at the moon, waiting for another drop of delicious MOOoooon honey! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep17
programme.desc: The Case Of The Unhelpful Queen - One of the Knights has tried a magic spell but it went wrong and he's shrunk! Queen Sparklewings could help him but she's hiding and won't come out. It's up to Noddy to investigate and work out why the Queen is hiding and how to persuade her to help the Knight grow again. With the help of his wwwbook Noddy discovers that the Queen has got felt pen on her face and is too shy to be seen! Once Noddy shows her how to remove the felt pen the Queen stops hiding and the Knight can return to the right size. Thank you Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep18
programme.desc: The Case Of The Mystery Artist - There's a mystery in Toyland! All the toys have drawn pictures of Deltoid but they've all been scribbled on and ruined! Noddy opens the investigation to find out who is the mystery artist. Using his wwwbook to follow the clues, Noddy realises that it's Deltoid who was drawing on all the pictures because he didn't think any of them look like him! Noddy suggests that they draw pictures again – and this time Deltoid can draw his own picture too. Clever Noddy's saved the day!

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep17
programme.desc: When Will The Water Come Back? - Jess is concerned that all the water on the farm is frozen and sets about working out when it will come back. He works out that once the sun is out the ice melts and learns all about freezing and melting..

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep18
programme.desc: How Can We Paint The Lilly Pad Green? - Mimi is trying to prepare for a visit from Horace and wants the hutch to feel like home for her froggy friend. Jess promises to paint the special seat Mimi has made for Horace green for her, but first he has to work out how to make green from different colours.

programme.desc: Smoovin On Up / The Great Shell Robbery - Smoove Move goes from underground street artist to world-famous pedicurist and lets his newfound fame go to his head. // Thieving hermit crabs steal the crew's shells, so they concoct an elaborate heist to get them back.

programme.desc: Scimitar - While searching for items missing from the treasure house, Puss enlists the help of the Scimitar, an evil sword that turns its wielder wicked.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep22
programme.desc: Secret Agent Sherman/Alexander Cartwright - When a special guest is revealed as the villainous Goldentoe and hijacks the show, Peabody and Sherman must find a way to escape and regain control

programme.title: Trollhunters Ep22
programme.desc: It'S About Time - The only way that Jim can remove Stricklers ring is if he stops time but he uses the time stopping artefact too soon..

programme.desc: Rise Of The Empress - On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: Cleopatra In Space Ep24
programme.desc: Eyeball - Brian and Akila get trapped inside this weird planet and Brian reprograms a broken Xerx robot and basically, it's like it's their baby. They have to raise it real fast so it can save them from fire monsters and junk.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On S2 Ep48
programme.desc: Apple Of My Ire/Funsgiving - After all their adventures, Branch no longer finds Cloud Guy as annoying as he once did. But to Cloud Guy, this is an unacceptable betrayal of their adversarial relationship. Dejected, he sets out to find a new rival to annoy./Biggie is hosting Funsgiving this year, and is therefore charged with preparing all of the best dishes for his friends. But in his quest to make things perfect, he goes a little too far…

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep48
programme.desc: The Panchurian Candidate - After Uncle King Julien turned Pancho into a deadly killer so he could take back his throne, King Julien must save the kingdom before it's too late

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Rupert And The Cheeky Sneeze - When one of Rupert's sneezes escapes the friends have to find it a home in the forest.

programme.title: Rupert Bear S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Rupert And The Special Sandcastle - Despite Miranda's warnings a sandcastle competition in Rocky Bay is in danger from the incoming tide

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep7
programme.desc: Ooo Ooo'S Jungle Drums - Raa Raa has found an infectious beat, and soon all the other animals in the jungle are joining in… except for Ooo Ooo, who just can't get the beat right. How can they find a way for all the friends to play together?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep8
programme.desc: Topsy'S Musical Stones - Topsy has readied the musical stones for a noisy game. Raa Raa has been left in charge, making sure that nobody jumps on them while Topsy reminds the other jungle inhabitants about the game. But temptation can be strong… especially when Ooo Ooo is about...

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep7
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Zooming Zipwire - Ted and PC Selby are building a zipwire to run from Greendale Crag all the way down into the valley. The kids are on a hike, led by Lauren which is due to culminate at the zipwire – the only trouble is, it's not built yet! Pat and Jess have to race against time to deliver the huge steel cable to the top of the crag before the kids get there. All's going well until Pat hits bumpy ground and the cable rolls out of the back of the jeep and back down the hill! It takes the combined efforts of Pat, Ben, the SDS helicopter and some nifty map reading to rewind the uncoiled and hopelessly tangled cable and get it back up to Greendale Crag. Pat makes it just in time and the zipwire is a roaring success – even Pat and Jess have a go on it. Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat Delivery Service Ep8
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Super Jet Boots - Julian and the kids at Greendale School are excited about a Festival of flight - Ted's coming to talk about aviation and Alf's bringing Cedric the racing pigeon. Pat has to deliver special jet boots to the school, built by Ted's inventor friend. Ted will demonstrate them. But on the way to Greendale, Pat stops to help Alf, whose cows have got loose. Pat sees Ajay, out for a day's bird-watching. Pat has promised to lend Ajay his wellies and asks Ajay to get them from the van, but Ajay takes the jet boots by mistake. By the time Pat realises the mixup, Ajay is airborne and can't control the powerful boots... Meanwhile Alf and Ted grow competitive as they try to win the kids' attention. Attempts to shout instructions to Ajay fail, but Pat realises Cedric could be the solution. The brave bird takes an instruction leaflet up to Ajay - who is then able to control the boots (using his toes) with ease! Meera, Julian and the others are delighted as Ajay touches down at Greendale School with the help of Cedric - the most welcome bird Ajay has ever watched!

programme.title: Fifi And The Flowertots Ep59

programme.desc: The Holiday Parties! - In Holiday Land, there's a town for every holiday...that is, until Pirate Myra uses Wizard Grouper's magic wand to turn every town into Pirate Town! Will Molly and Gil be able to restore Holiday Land back to normal?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Our New Neighbor! - Josh and Blue have some BIG news--a new neighbor just moved in next door... it's Periwinkle! We play Blue's Clues to figure out how we can help Periwinkle feel welcome.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Blue's Dino Clues - It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the skidoo frame and starts to hatch! We figure out what kind of dinosaur is inside the egg so we can reunite the egg with their family.

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep501
programme.desc: AJ to the Rescue - Blaze and AJ are racing through the jungle when Blaze gets trapped in super sticky mud! Now it's up to AJ and his new animal friends, to go on an epic adventure to save Blaze!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Treasure of El Bravo - After Enrique steals the heart of El Bravo, there's only one person who can help Santi and crew save the day: Tomás's younger sister, Prima Tina!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Wavey Jones' Locker - Baby Shark and William must travel to the deep dark depths to retrieve Baby's lost microphone.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep805
programme.desc: Pups Save The Mustache / Pups Save the Funhouse - The Pups must help to find Mayor Humdinger's mustache after he accidentally shaves it off before it's about to be on the cover of a magazine. // When a carnival train gets stuck in a tunnel, it results in a mountainside funhouse-style wild ride.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep222
programme.desc: Paddington's Radio Show / Paddington's Butler - Mr. Curry's & Paddington's favorite radio show is cancelled - how will they ever know the ending now? // Mr. Curry ends up being Paddington's butler for the day - but he's better giving orders than taking them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep511
programme.desc: Pedro the Cowboy - Pedro Pony pretends he is a proper cowboy, telling everyone stories in the camp he has set up in the garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep512
programme.desc: Peppa and George's Garden - Grandpa Pig pops round with some seeds for Peppa and George. Daddy Pig helps out by being a scarecrow

programme.title: Peppa Pig S05 Ep513
programme.desc: The Flying Vet - Doctor Hamster is rushed off her feet when nearly all the animals need her help on the same day.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep161
programme.desc: Backwards Day - Anna and Froga forgot that today is Ron's Day. There's nothing to eat and Christopher is missing! But, in the rush, everything is going wrong. How will they ever manage to throw a great party for Ron?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep162
programme.desc: Stuck - Froga has made Christopher a homemade helmet in watermelon, with ear holes for his stuffed animal Geegee - but when Froga hand gets stuck inside one of the holes, it's an adventure trying to release her.

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep216
programme.desc: It's YOUR Birthday - It's YOUR birthday! DJ Slip has the music, Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are making a very special birthday cake, and we play Blue's Clues to figure out what Blue wants to play at your party! As we celebrate, we play games and gather prizes for a pinata!

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep81
programme.desc: Give It Back - Tinky Winky and Dipsy both want a go with Tinky Winky's bag and start to squabble. The Noo-­‐noo sucks up the bag and only gives it back when Tinky Winky and Dipsy are ready to share.

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: Coat - Dee encourages a friend to say 'coat' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see all different types of coat - a snowy coat, a glowy coat and even a goat in a coat!

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep41
programme.desc: Scrub-A-Dub-Pup - Granny Po loves her puppy, but her puppy loves lying in a muddy flowerbed. Can the team help her out of this muddle?

programme.desc: It's time to look after Monty - JoJo and Gran Gran look after Ned's dog Monty. JoJo wants to play with Monty all day, but Gran Gran says Monty also needs some food, a walk in the park, and a good brush!

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep4
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Kattar vs. Allen
programme.desc: Prelims - With three consecutive Fight of the Night awards, Calvin Kattar has established himself as a must see in thestacked featherweight division, but the next goal on his hit list is earning a world title shot, and beating Britishstandout Arnold Allen in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night on October 30 at the APEX in Las Vegaswill get him closer to the top. That’s not an easy task for the New Englander, though, as Allen is on one ofthe most impressive runs in the sport, an 11-fight winning streak that includes UFC victories over the likes of Gilbert Melendez, Sodiq Yusuff and Dan Hooker

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Kattar vs. Allen
programme.desc: Main Event - With three consecutive Fight of the Night awards, Calvin Kattar has established himself as a must see in thestacked featherweight division, but the next goal on his hit list is earning a world title shot, and beating Britishstandout Arnold Allen in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night on October 30 at the APEX in Las Vegaswill get him closer to the top. That’s not an easy task for the New Englander, though, as Allen is on one ofthe most impressive runs in the sport, an 11-fight winning streak that includes UFC victories over the likes of Gilbert Melendez, Sodiq Yusuff and Dan Hooker
